name: New Service Station Car Wash
description: Enjoy the latest CarWash station and new car wash garage game. Luxurious car service station game will give you enough chance to master you're driving and parking skills. In this realistic city environment you have to drive multiple muscles cars towards the petrol pump where Your car will be washed by the service men. There are multiple portions in this station like car washing. You can get your car wash at very low cost. This is an excellent game if you want to play a service station game with Latest model cars
